description: This file contains implementation of WiFi management frame handling, including association, authentication, GAS, and vendor-specific frames. It registers callbacks for various WiFi frame events and processes incoming frames accordingly.

methods.name: int handle_assoc_rsp_frame(INT ap_index,mac_address_t sta_mac,unsigned char * frame,UINT len)
methods.description: Handles association response frames and invokes the registered callback.

methods.name: int handle_assoc_req_frame(INT ap_index,mac_address_t sta_mac,unsigned char * frame,UINT len)
methods.description: Handles association request frames and invokes the registered callback.

methods.name: int handle_auth_frame(INT ap_index,mac_address_t sta_mac,unsigned char * frame,UINT len,wifi_direction_t dir)
methods.description: Handles authentication frames, differentiating between uplink and downlink, and invokes corresponding callbacks.

methods.name: int handle_gas_init_public_action_frame(INT ap_index,mac_address_t sta_mac,unsigned char * public_action_data,UINT len)
methods.description: Processes GAS initial request frames, identifies protocol and invokes specific callbacks based on the protocol.

methods.name: int handle_vendor_public_action_frame(INT ap_index,mac_address_t sta_mac,unsigned char * public_action_data,UINT len)
methods.description: Processes vendor-specific public action frames, particularly DPP frames.

methods.name: int handle_public_action_frame(INT ap_index,mac_address_t sta_mac,wifi_publicActionFrameHdr_t * ppublic_hdr,UINT len)
methods.description: Dispatches handling of different public action frames based on the action type.

methods.name: int mgmt_frame_received_callback(INT ap_index,mac_address_t sta_mac,UCHAR * frame,UINT len,wifi_mgmtFrameType_t type,wifi_direction_t dir)
methods.description: Main entry point for processing received management frames, dispatches to specific handlers based on frame type.

methods.name: void wifi_assoc_rsp_frame_callback_register(wifi_sentAssocRspFrame_callback func)
methods.description: Registers a callback for association response frame transmission.

methods.name: void wifi_assoc_req_frame_callback_register(wifi_receivedAssocReqFrame_callback func)
methods.description: Registers a callback for association request frame reception.

methods.name: void wifi_auth_frame_tx_callback_register(wifi_sentAuthFrame_callback func)
methods.description: Registers a callback for authentication frame transmission.

methods.name: void wifi_auth_frame_rx_callback_register(wifi_receivedAuthFrame_callback func)
methods.description: Registers a callback for authentication frame reception.

ctags.name: handle_assoc_req_frame
ctags.pattern: /^int handle_assoc_req_frame(INT ap_index, mac_address_t sta_mac, unsigned char *frame, UINT len) $/

ctags.name: handle_assoc_rsp_frame
ctags.pattern: /^int handle_assoc_rsp_frame(INT ap_index, mac_address_t sta_mac, unsigned char *frame, UINT len) $/

ctags.name: handle_auth_frame
ctags.pattern: /^int handle_auth_frame(INT ap_index, mac_address_t sta_mac, unsigned char *frame, UINT len, wifi_/
ctags.signature: (INT ap_index,mac_address_t sta_mac,unsigned char * frame,UINT len,wifi_direction_t dir)

ctags.name: handle_gas_init_public_action_frame
ctags.pattern: /^int handle_gas_init_public_action_frame(INT ap_index, mac_address_t sta_mac, unsigned char *publ/

ctags.name: handle_vendor_public_action_frame
ctags.pattern: /^int handle_vendor_public_action_frame(INT ap_index, mac_address_t sta_mac, unsigned char *public/

ctags.name: mgmt_frame_received_callback
ctags.pattern: /^int mgmt_frame_received_callback(INT ap_index, mac_address_t sta_mac, UCHAR *frame, UINT len, wi/
ctags.signature: (INT ap_index,mac_address_t sta_mac,UCHAR * frame,UINT len,wifi_mgmtFrameType_t type,wifi_direction_t dir)
